name: Space Guns
description:
Controls: WASD to move.

Left mouse button to aim and shoot.

Q to destroy spacechips

Left Controls to switch guns if you have more than 2

Space to dash

Your Spaceship was over run with Spacebots and you have to kill them all...                           You can buy new guns from vending machines using the Spacechips that the robots drop when killed. But beware the more you carry the slower you'll move.
